title: Designing an intelligent customer classification model using the hybrid nonlinear Bayesian-neural networks approach
details: N Kashani Nikoo, M Rabiei, K Fathi Hafshejani - Journal of Applied Research on …, 2024
abstract: This is an applied and exploratory research in which the information of 98,604 customers of one of the Iranian banks, randomly selected from the banks active in the country, was analyzed using 3 approaches: data mining, fuzzy, and nonlinear …
